articles.title: Hungary and Serbia's autocratic leaders will warmly welcome China's Xi during rare European visit - The Associated Press
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping will spend most of his five-day tour in Europe this week in two small countries at the continent’s eastern half. It's a region Beijing has used as a foothold for its expanding economic ambitions in Europe. Xi first stops in Paris on …

articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: Xi Jinping begins first European tour in five years in France - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Chinese president wants to repair ties with a sceptical Western Europe but faces questions over his Ukraine war stance.
articles.content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping is on his first trip to Europe in five years, which is likely to be dominated by Russias war in Ukraine as well as economic strains between Beijing and Brussels.
